bookTitle: The Teachings of the Law of One
description: An Invitation to Remember — Ancient wisdom for modern seekers, presented as timeless story.

content: There is a story older than memory. It has been told in different ways across all cultures. Perhaps you already know it. Perhaps, in reading these words, you are not learning something new but remembering something you always carried within.
